column6: SPINNING FROM THE AMAZING SPIDER-MAN! The greatest secret Spider-Girl has is her secret identity. Her secret protects both her and the lives of her friends and loved ones. Anya Corazon makes a fateful decision to share that secret with someone...but what are the consequences, and why has the RED HULK come for a rematch against Spider-Girl?
column8: | editor:Tom Brennan | penciller:Clayton Henry | penciller (cover):Jelena Kevic Djurdjevic | writer:Paul Tobin
